generic.title: Oops! An error occurred
generic.description: Something went wrong. We apologize for the inconvenience.

dataLoading.defaultMessage: Unable to retrieve your data. Please try again later.
dataLoading.userDataError: Unable to load this user's data. Check your connection and try again.

accessDenied.title: Access denied
accessDenied.description: You do not have the necessary rights to access this application.
accessDenied.contact: Contact {supportEmail} to obtain the necessary access rights.

notFound.title: Oops! It looks like this page doesn't exist
notFound.contact: If you think this is an error, contact

updateSetting.title: Error updating setting
updateSetting.description: Unable to update the display setting. Please try again later.

about.title: About
about.description: Ticketshop EPFL allows CFF to control the authorizations of EPFL collaborators who need to order train tickets on EPFL funds.
about.cffUsageTitle: In other words, Ticketshop EPFL allows CFF to:
about.additionalInfo: Ticketshop EPFL allows choosing the funds on which train tickets may be purchased on the CFF platform.
about.cffUsage:
• Validate train ticket purchase permissions (Accred right railticket),
  • Retrieve the list of funds and travel requests.

help.title: Help
help.accredRequirement: Make sure you have the Accred “railticket” right on at least one fund. Without it, you will not have access to the system.
help.supportIntro: There are several ways to get help, but before submitting a support request, make sure you have read KB0012580:
help.helpSwissPass: SwissPass problems, product questions, or issues on sbb.ch: contact the CFF hotline;
help.helpSwissPassBuy: For any questions regarding train ticket purchases on the CFF Webshop platform
help.helpLink: To link your SwissPass to your EPFL account: https://www.epfl.ch/campus/mobility/fr/mobilite-et-voyages/mobilite-pendulaire/trains/
help.helpMobility: Travel-related questions: mobilite@epfl.ch (opens a ticket with the Mobility support group);
help.helpAccredRights: For issues with Accred, access rights, or funds: create a ticket via 1234;
help.helpTechnicalContrib: For technical questions or to contribute to the application, visit the GitHub repository and open an issue if needed.

link.title: How do I link my SwissPass with my EPFL account?

locked.title: My CFF account is locked. What should I do?
locked.description: Access to the online railticket ordering application may be locked after several failed attempts. This problem is not related to Gaspar/Tequila authentication, so there is no need to change your Gaspar password. Please contact the Service Desk.

right.title: I am an accreditor for unit XYZ, but I cannot grant the railticket right?
right.description: The railticket right is managed only by people with the respadmin role.

sync.title: Why aren't my hide/show changes in Ticketshop immediately reflected on CFF?
sync.description: Synchronization between Ticketshop and CFF may take several hours. After this, the changes should appear on CFF.

change.title: How can I switch between my personal account and my EPFL account in CFF applications?
change.description: Look for the “factory” icon for the business (EPFL) account and the “person” icon for the personal account. In the mobile app, switching is possible at the time of ticket payment. See KB0014657.

tech.title: Technologies used
tech.paragraph: ticketshop.epfl.ch is developed with Next.js, a JavaScript framework based on React.js. Its authentication relies on EntraID. Fund data is retrieved from api.epfl.ch. The application is hosted on Kubernetes (OpenShift) at EPFL.
